text: Indian Army NCC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 54 Vacancies Indian Army NCC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 54 Vacancies: Indian Army has issued a notification for the recruitment of married/ unmarried Male, unmarried Female candidates & also from Wards of Battle Casualties of Army Personnel, for grant of Short Service Commission in the Indian Army under NCC Special Entry Scheme 42nd Course – OCT 2017. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17-01-2017 at 10.00 hrs to 15-02-2017 at 10.00 hrs & send hard copy of application on or before 20-02-2017 for Ward of Battle Casualties at Dte Gen. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Indian Army NCC Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 54 Name of the Course & Posts: NCC Special Entry Scheme 42nd Course – OCT 2017 1. NCC Men: 50 Posts i. Gen Category: 45 Posts ii. Wards of Battle Casualties of Army Personnel: 05 Posts 2. NCC Women: 04 Posts i. Women Gen Category: 03 Posts ii. Wards of Battle Casualties of Army Personnel: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit is 19 to 25 years (born not earlier than 02-07-1992 & not later than 01-07-1998) for NCC candidates (including wards of Battle Casualties). Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Degree of a recognized University or equivalent with aggregate of minimum 50% marks, minimum two academic years in the senior Division/ Wing of NCC & have obtained minimum of ‘B’ Grade in ‘C’ Certificate Exam of NCC for NCC ‘C’ Certificate Holders & Degree of a recognized University or equivalent with aggregate of minimum 50% marks for Ward of Battle Casualties of Army Personnel Only. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: For NCC ‘C’ Certificate Holders: Eligible candidates can apply online through website www.joinindianarmy.nic.in from 17-01-2017 at 10.00 hrs to 15-02-2017 at 10.00 hrs & 01 copy of the print out of application form duly signed, photograph affixed & self attested along with all documents will be carried by the candidate to the SSB & for other details refer the notification. For Ward of Battle Casualties of Army Personnel: Eligible candidates can send their applications along with certificates as given in notification to Dte Gen of Recruiting/ Rtg-A, NCC Entry, West Block III, R.K. Puram, New Delhi-110066 on or before 20-02-2017. Instructions to Apply online: 1. Before applying online candidate should have valid personal email ID & mobile no 2. Log on to website www.joinindianarmy.nic.in 3. Click on “Officers Entry Apply/ Login” & Again on “Registration” 4. Read Instructions carefully & Click on “Continue ” 5. Fill the online registration form 6. After getting registered click on “Apply Online” 7. Fill all the details carefully & submit the Form 8. Take Print out of online application form for Future use. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application: 17-01-2017 at 10.00 hrs. Last Date for Online Application: 15-02-2017 at 10.00 hrs. Last Date for Receipt of Application For Ward of Battle Casualties at Dte Gen: 20-02-2017.
